text: Hagi mopama ome atre eme atrema hu kazigatira muse zagame'ma nehazana, amanahu zagame nehazanki antahiho. Fatgo avu'avazama nehia Anumzamofona agi'a ahentesga nehune hu'za hu'naze. Hianagi nagra amanage hu'na hu'noe, nasunku huanki'na musena nosu'na haviza hu'na amne zankna hugahue. Na'ankure nagrama koana, havi zamavuzmava nehu'za havige nehaza vahe'mo'za, mago'ene vahera rezmatga nehu'za, zamazeri haviza nehazanki, ina vaheku knare vahera mani'ne huta antahimigahune.
